00021 SimpleHcalCalibrationProcessor aSimpleHcalCalibrationProcessor;

00023 SimpleHcalCalibrationProcessor::SimpleHcalCalibrationProcessor() : marlin::Processor("SimpleHcalCalibrationProcessor"){
00024   _description = "Simple all-in-one calibration for CALICE Hcal";
00025 
00026   registerProcessorParameter("InputFile",
00027                              "Name of flat file with calibration constants",
00028                              _inputFileName,
00029                              std::string("simpleHcalCalibration.dat"));
00030 
00031   registerProcessorParameter("InputCollection",
00032                              "Name of input collection of CaliceHits",
00033                              _inputColName,
00034                              std::string("RawCaliceHits"));
00035 
00036   registerProcessorParameter("OutputCollection",
00037                              "Name of output collection of CaliceHits",
00038                              _outputColName,
00039                              std::string("CalibratedCaliceHits"));
00040 
00041   registerProcessorParameter( "correction" , 
00042                               "chose between vasiliys and satorus correction formula"  ,
00043                               _correction ,
00044                               std::string("vasiliy") ) ;
00045 
00046   registerProcessorParameter( "Npix" , 
00047                               "Number of effectiv pixel" ,
00048                               _Npix ,
00049                               (float) 1200);              
00050 
00051    registerProcessorParameter( "X-talk" , 
00052                               "x-talk probability" ,
00053                               _xTalk ,
00054                               (float) 0.3);               
00055 
00056    registerProcessorParameter( "alpha" , 
00057                               "vasiliys correction paramerter" ,
00058                               _alpha ,
00059                               (float) 0.0010);               
00060  
00061   registerProcessorParameter( "maxPixel_Cut" , 
00062                               "maximum number of fired pixels alllowed" ,
00063                               _pixCut ,
00064                               (int) 3000);               
00065 
00066 
00067   _calcPed = true;                           
00068 }

00075 void SimpleHcalCalibrationProcessor::init(){
00076   std::ifstream inFile;
00077   inFile.open(_inputFileName.c_str());
00078   if (inFile.is_open()){
00079     unsigned short mod, cell;
00080     float mip, mipEr, gain, gainEr, ic, icEr;
00081     unsigned short stat;
00082     while (inFile.good()){
00083       inFile >> mod >> cell >> mip >> mipEr >> gain >> gainEr >> ic >> icEr >> stat;
00084       if ((mod < 1) || (mod > HCAL_N_MOD))
00085         std::cout << "Array too small for module " << mod << "." << std::endl;
00086       if (cell >= HCAL_N_CELL)
00087         std::cout << "Array too small for cell " << cell << "." << std::endl;   
00088       _mip[mod][cell] = mip;
00089       _gain[mod][cell] = gain;
00090       _ic[mod][cell] = ic;
00091       _stat[mod][cell] = stat;
00092 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00093    std::cout << mod << " " << cell << " " << mip << " " << gain << " " << ic << " " << stat << std::endl;
00094 #endif      
00095     }
00096   }
00097   _pedEvents=0;
00098   _pedExists=false;
00099   printParameters();
00100 }
00101 
00102 
00103 void SimpleHcalCalibrationProcessor::processEvent(lcio::LCEvent *evt){
00104   LCCollection *inCol = evt->getCollection(_inputColName);
00105   if (inCol){
00106     TriggerBits trigBits(evt->getParameters().getIntVal(PAR_TRIGGER_EVENT));
00107     if (trigBits.isPurePedestalTrigger()) {
00108       if (!_calcPed) resetPedestal();
00109       sumupPedestal(inCol);
00110       _pedEvents++;
00111     }
00112     if (trigBits.isBeamTrigger() && _calcPed) calcPedestal();
00113 
00114     if (_pedExists) {
00115 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00116       std::cout << "processing real beam event" << std::endl;
00117 #endif
00118 
00119       LCCollectionVec *outCol = new LCCollectionVec(LCIO::RAWCALORIMETERHIT);
00120 
00121       for (unsigned i=0; i< static_cast<unsigned>(inCol->getNumberOfElements()); i++){
00122         FastCaliceHit *hit = dynamic_cast<FastCaliceHit*>(inCol->getElementAt(i));
00123         unsigned short mod = (hit->getModuleID() & 0xFF00) >> 8;
00124         unsigned short cell = hit->getChip()*18 + hit->getChannel();
00125         
00126 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00127         std::cout << "old hit: " << mod << " " << cell << " " << hit->getEnergyValue() << std::endl;
00128 #endif
00129         if ((mod > HCAL_N_MOD+1) || (cell > HCAL_N_CELL)) continue;
00130         if (_stat[mod][cell] != 111) continue; //ignore cells with missing calibration
00131         float ampl = hit->getEnergyValue() - _ped[mod][cell];  //ampl in adc counts
00132 //      float ampl = hit->getEnergyValue();
00133         float amplErr = 0;
00134         float N_pix = _Npix;    //number of effective pixel
00135         float xTalk = _xTalk;     //crosstalk
00136 
00137         //   correction factor
00138         float corr_vas;      // relative linearity correction factor
00139         float corrErr;   // uncertainty on relative correction
00140         //      correction with global factor on pixel level (involves gain and ic)
00141         
00142         //from satoru
00143         if(_correction == "satoru")
00144           {
00145             ampl = N_pix*std::log(2 * xTalk / (xTalk - 1. + sqrt(xTalk*xTalk + 2 * xTalk * (1.-2.*ampl*_ic[mod][cell]/_gain[mod][cell] /N_pix) +1.))); //corrected ampl in pix
00146             
00147             ampl = ampl*_gain[mod][cell]/_ic[mod][cell]/_mip[mod][cell]; //ampl in mip
00148           }
00149 
00150         //from vasiliy
00151         else if(_correction == "vasiliy")
00152           {     
00153             corr_vas = 1./(1.-_alpha*ampl*_ic[mod][cell]/_gain[mod][cell]);
00154 
00155             ampl /= _mip[mod][cell];   // amplitude in uncorrected MIP
00156             ampl *= corr_vas;
00157 
00158             float cutAmpl = _pixCut*_gain[mod][cell]/_ic[mod][cell]/_mip[mod][cell];
00159             if (ampl > cutAmpl) ampl = cutAmpl;
00160           }
00161 
00162         else
00163           ampl = ampl;
00164 
00165         corrErr = 0;
00166 
00167         if (ampl < 0.5) continue;  // ignore hits<0.5MIP
00168 
00169         float mipErr = .05*_mip[mod][cell];  // relative mip uncertainty (global)
00170         amplErr = ampl * sqrt(mipErr*mipErr + corrErr*corrErr);
00171 
00172         //   create new CaliceHit and append to output collection
00173         FastCaliceHit* newHit = new FastCaliceHit(hit->getModuleID(), hit->getChip(), hit->getChannel(),
00174                                           ampl, amplErr, hit->getTimeStamp());
00175 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00176         std::cout << "new hit: " << mod << " " << cell << " " << ampl << std::endl;
00177 #endif
00178         outCol->addElement(newHit);
00179       }
00180       evt->addCollection(outCol,_outputColName);
00181     }
00182   }
00183 
00184 }
00185

00187 
00188 void SimpleHcalCalibrationProcessor::end(){
00189 
00190   if(_correction=="vasiliy")
00191     std::cout<<"used correction from vasiliy with correctionfactor "<<_alpha<<std::endl;
00192   else if(_correction=="satoru")
00193     std::cout<<"used correction from satoru with "<<_Npix<<" pixels and "<<_xTalk*100<<"% crosstalk probability"<<std::endl;
00194   else 
00195     std::cout<<"! uncorected data !"<<std::endl;
00196 }
00197

00199 
00200 void SimpleHcalCalibrationProcessor::resetPedestal(){
00201 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00202   std::cout << "resetting pedestal" << std::endl;
00203 #endif
00204   for (unsigned short mod=0; mod<HCAL_N_MOD+1; mod++){
00205     for (unsigned short cell=0; cell<HCAL_N_CELL; cell++){
00206       _pedSum[mod][cell] = 0;
00207       _pedSumSquare[mod][cell] = 0;
00208       _pedNum[mod][cell] = 0;
00209     }
00210   }
00211   _calcPed = true;
00212 }
00213 
00214 
00215 
00216 void SimpleHcalCalibrationProcessor::sumupPedestal(LCCollection *col){
00217 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00218   std::cout << "summing up pedestal" << std::endl;
00219 #endif
00220   for (unsigned i=0; i < static_cast<unsigned>(col->getNumberOfElements()); i++){
00221     FastCaliceHit *hit = dynamic_cast<FastCaliceHit*>(col->getElementAt(i));
00222     unsigned short mod = (hit->getModuleID() & 0xFF00) >> 8;
00223     unsigned short cell = hit->getChip()*18 + hit->getChannel();
00224     float ampl = hit->getEnergyValue();
00225     _pedSum[mod][cell] += ampl;
00226     _pedSumSquare[mod][cell] += ampl*ampl;
00227     _pedNum[mod][cell]++;
00228   }
00229 }
00230 
00231 
00232 
00233 void SimpleHcalCalibrationProcessor::calcPedestal(){
00234 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00235   std::cout << "calculating pedestal" << std::endl;
00236 #endif
00237   for (unsigned short mod=1; mod<HCAL_N_MOD+1; mod++){
00238     for (unsigned short cell=0; cell<HCAL_N_CELL; cell++){
00239       if (_pedNum[mod][cell]!=0) _ped[mod][cell] = _pedSum[mod][cell]/_pedNum[mod][cell];
00240       //      _ped[mod][cell] = sqrt( _pedSumSquare[mod][cell] - _pedSum[mod][cell]*_ped[mod][cell]);
00241       //      if (_pedNum[mod][cell]>0){
00242       //        _ped[mod][cell] /= (float)_pedNum[mod][cell];
00243       //      }else{
00244       //        _ped[mod][cell] = 33000;
00245       //      }
00246     }
00247   }
00248   _calcPed = false;
00249   _pedExists = true;
00250 }
